: : Rodimus Prime : : 
Rodimus transformes back to robot mode. 
Rodimus Prime: Yeah I have to have this meeting but you can be there. I like having you with me. 
He put his arm around her waist. And starts to walk with her towards his office. 
Rodimus Prime: Nightlight, after last night, I wanted to ask you something. How would you feel about moveing into my quarters? 
 Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote: Nightlight:

"Yes, Rodimus, if you want I can stay with you a while"replied Nightlight 
while a smile light up her face "But I guess that you have to stay soon in a 
meeting..."
